3586.name: Equal coverage casualties ratio (Eisensee and Strömberg 2007)
3586.description: The casualties ratio indicates how many casualties would make media coverage equally likely, all else equal (controlling for: the number killed and affected, country, year, and month).
3586.datasetName: Newsworthiness of disasters by disaster type and region - Eisensee and Strömberg (2007)

source.name: Eisensee and Strömberg (2007)
source.dataPublisherSource: The data was produced using disasters identified and documented by the Centre for Research on the Epidemiology of Disasters (CRED) between 1968 - 2002, and coverage in evening news broadcasts of major US networks as recorded by the Vanderbilt News Archives.
